languages.text: "Однажды все мы умрем за Него! Но не как трусы, а как герои! Соратники, укрепитесь в вере и готовьтесь к борьбе!"
"One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"
languages.original_text: "Однажды все мы умрем за Него! Но не как трусы, а как герои! Соратники, укрепитесь в вере и готовьтесь к борьбе!"

traits.locale_text: "One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"
"One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"
"One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"
"One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"
"One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"
"One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"

languages.text: 「いつか我々は皆、主のために死ぬだろう！臆病者としてではなく、英雄として！同志たちよ、信仰を強く持ち、戦いに備えよ！」
languages.original_text: "One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"

traits.locale_text: 「いつか我々は皆、主のために死ぬだろう！臆病者としてではなく、英雄として！同志たちよ、信仰を強く持ち、戦いに備えよ！」

languages.text: “总有一天，我们都会为了帝皇而死！但不是作为懦夫而死，而是作为英雄壮烈牺牲！我的战友们，你们要坚定信念，做好战斗准备！”
languages.original_text: "One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"

traits.locale_text: “总有一天，我们都会为了帝皇而死！但不是作为懦夫而死，而是作为英雄壮烈牺牲！我的战友们，你们要坚定信念，做好战斗准备！”

languages.text: «¡Todos acabaremos muriendo por el Emperador! ¡No como cobardes, sino como héroes! ¡Camaradas míos, sean fuertes en su fe y prepárense para luchar!».
languages.original_text: "One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Todos acabaremos muriendo por el Emperador! ¡No como cobardes, sino como héroes! ¡Camaradas míos, sean fuertes en su fe y prepárense para luchar!».

languages.text: "Eines Tages sterben wir alle für ihn! Nicht als Feiglinge, sondern als Helden! Meine Kameraden, seid stark im Glauben und bereitet Euch auf den Kampf vor!"
languages.original_text: "One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"

traits.locale_text: "Eines Tages sterben wir alle für ihn! Nicht als Feiglinge, sondern als Helden! Meine Kameraden, seid stark im Glauben und bereitet Euch auf den Kampf vor!"

languages.text: « Un jour, nous mourrons pour Lui ! Pas comme des lâches, mais comme des héros ! Ne laissez pas votre foi faiblir, mes camarades, et préparez-vous à combattre ! »
languages.original_text: "One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, nous mourrons pour Lui ! Pas comme des lâches, mais comme des héros ! Ne laissez pas votre foi faiblir, mes camarades, et préparez-vous à combattre ! »

languages.text: "Gün gelecek, hepimiz İmparator adına öleceğiz! Ancak korkak değil, kahraman olarak! Yoldaşlarım, inancınızı yitirmeyin. Savaşmaya hazırlanın!"
languages.original_text: "One day, we shall all die for Him! Not as cowards, but as heroes! My comrades, be strong in your faith and prepare to fight!"

traits.locale_text: "Gün gelecek, hepimiz İmparator adına öleceğiz! Ancak korkak değil, kahraman olarak! Yoldaşlarım, inancınızı yitirmeyin; savaşmaya hazırlanın!"
